name: JavaScriptExecutionMode
shortdesc: When should a JavaScript debugger be shown.

property.name: never
property.shortdesc: Never show the JavaScript debugger. Treat runtime errors by throwing a JavaScript exceptions.

property.name: OnRuntimeError
property.shortdesc: Show the JavaScript debugger is a runtime error occurs.

property.name: BeforeRunning
property.shortdesc: Show the JavaScript debugger at the first line of the JavaScript.
